Plot: Queen is a movie about growing up. Rani (Kangana Ranaut) is a Delhi girl from a conservative family who is ditched by her fianc√© just before her wedding. Shocked by this, she decides to set out on the planned honeymoon alone. As she travels the world and meets new people, she gains new experiences and discovers her own identity.
Title: Queen
Actors: Kangana Ranaut, Rajkummar Rao, Lisa Haydon, Jeffrey Ho
Writer: Vikas Bahl (story and screenplay), Chaitally Parmar (story and screenplay), Parveez Sheikh (story and screenplay), Anvita Dutt (dialogue), Kangana Ranaut (dialogue)
